questions.quote: Oh, Peterman ran off to Burma, and now he wants me to run the catalog.
No, no. No, no, sir. I ordered George to drive around insulting people today. Because I'm tired of all your macho head games.
'Kay. I'll uh, I'll see you later. Anybody want some tomatoes?
Jerry, I left you a pair right here... C'mon. There, put on those boots.
The next thing you know, he'll have you driving him to the airport..
George, of course, of course it can wait until march if that is what you want.
All right Mrs. S. I and my good pal Keith Hernandez will be right back.
Yeah yeah! You see, this is exactly what they want to do to you. They play one against the other. You can't let them manipulate you like that.
The service was slow. And God forbid they should refill the water. How does 12.4% sound?
You go to the airlines, you tell them you got a death in the family? They give you 50% off the fare.
